node.name: Twikle
node.shortdescription:
Twikle Plugin

Twikle - Twitter Klient for Eclipse - is a plugin that integrates Twitter with your favourite development environment. Best used as a fast view, Twikle lets you keep an eye on your timeline at work.

Features

  • Look and feel of Twitter website
  • Uses account color information
  • Display "reply-to" status inplace (first level)
  • Proxy support
  • Edit tweets (delete and tweet), "detweet" :)
  • Allows copy and paste of tweets' text
  • Open tweeted urls in system browser
  • Chat window (ConversationTab)
  • Local (offline) history of tweets
node.body:
Twikle Plugin

Twikle - Twitter Klient for Eclipse - is a plugin that integrates Twitter with your favourite development environment. Best used as a fast view, Twikle lets you keep an eye on your timeline at work.

Features

  • Look and feel of Twitter website
  • Uses account color information
  • Display "reply-to" status inplace (first level)
  • Proxy support
  • Edit tweets (delete and tweet), "detweet" :)
  • Allows copy and paste of tweets' text
  • Open tweeted urls in system browser
  • Chat window (ConversationTab)
  • Local (offline) history of tweets
